channel.title: World Building: Collaborative Maps
channel.description: I suspect these are techniques everyone's aware of, but on the off chance they aren't: on the new Age of Ravens site I talk about my tips and tricks for doing collaborative map-building in online ttrpgs. This is the second in a series (the last one covered tools for naming), with links and examples. The site as a whole is under construction, but you should check it out. If you have additional ideas/resources, I'd love to hear about them. https://www.ageofravensgames.com/blog/world-building-collaborative-maps

item.title: World Building: Collaborative Maps
item.dc:creator: @jkitz
item.description:
@jkitz wrote:

I wasn’t aware of these tools - i.e. Hex Kit – I’ve used the old Hexographer
I’m not sure how to start my own “google drawing” but I imagine that just requires some more digging.

Read full topic

World Building: Collaborative Maps — Age of Ravens Games

Some tricks and ideas for doing collaborative map building online.
